name: Wonder World Creator - Dress Up & Picture Maker
name_original: Wonder World Creator - Dress Up & Picture Maker
description:
Wonder World Creator for iPhone/ iPad/ iPod

DRESS UP & PICTURE MAKER

FUN, SAFE, CREATIVE ENVIRONMENT

Wonder World Creator lets you make your very own customized dress up characters and add them to the picture maker. Create an UNLIMITED collection of personalized dress up characters that look just like you, your family, your friends and your favorite celebrities.

Browse through thousands of stylish, entertaining and hilarious clothing options and effortlessly put them together in our builder. Start building your personal gallery of designs.

Create your own WeeMee and send to your friends with your favourite messaging app – join over 60 million WeeMees already created!!

Wonder World Creator allows you to express yourself in a safe environment.

Make'em and Save'em......... Have lots of fun.

Features:
Customize your own personal avatar with fun clothes, hairstyles, food, locations, and more!
With billions of combinations to create.
Awesome high definition graphics.
Build a gallery of avatars and customize them over and over!

Be your own stylist and create billions of combinations of cool clothes in hilarious settings!


Browse THOUSANDS of unique designs options including:

- Eyes
- Eyebrows
- Hair
- Noses
- Mouths
- Beards
- Moustaches
- Tops
- T-Shirts
- Trousers
- Dresses
- Super Hero Suits
- Trainers
- Glasses
- Sun Glasses
- Scarfs
- Ties
- Hats
- Gloves
- Jewellery
- Watches
- Belts
- Bags
- Purses
- Handbags
- Masks
- Accessories
- Animals and Pets
- Characters
- Backgrounds

Plus we are constantly updating with new and exciting content.
